English: YURI TO ALL UNITS. WE'RE CLOSING IN ON THE BASE. ALL UNITS ATTACK! OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, GOOD WORK, ENEMY DEFENCES ARE BROKEN. INFANTRY SHOULD CLEAR THE BASE OFF STRAGGLERS AND YURI SHOULD PREPARE TO HOLD THE BASE. THE ENEMY COUNTER-ATTACK IS COMING. BAZA OUT.
YELENA TO YURI, WE ARE COMING TO THE FRONT OF THE BASE TO HELP YOU OUT. OUT.
DMITRI TO YURI, WE'RE GONNA MINE THE ROAD AND KEEP AN EYE ON THE TANKS. WE'LL LET YOU KNOW WHEN THEY'RE COMING.
DMITRI TO YURI, THE ATTACK IS HERE AND IT'S BAD. FEW LIGHT TANKS IN THE BACK BUT THE CHARGE IS LED BY AN ABRAMS PLATOON. HOPEFULLY THE MINES WILL DO THEIR WORK. GET READY, YURI!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS. GOOD WORK. THE ENEMY IS RETREATING. WE HAVE WON A GREAT VICTORY TODAY, COMRADES! BAZA OUT.
